0.1.1.name: wordpress/twitpic-it
0.1.1.description:
Uploads your images to Twitpic as you upload them to your blog. It works with the Media Uploader and any photo gallery plugin that adds images as attachments in the Media Library, such as PhotoSmash.

Links

  • Forum

Features

For support and more documentation, visit the plugin's homepage: TwitPic-It

  • Use your Twitter username and password
  • Provides a checkbox on the Media Uploader that you can uncheck so you can skip uploading an image to Twitpic
  • (Optional) Automatically tweet your new images to Twitter
  • Works with any photo plugins that add images to the WordPress Media Library (e.g. PhotoSmash)
  • Keeps a record of the TwitPic URLs...go to the TwitPicIt settings page and view the log at bottom
